duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide emergency care and treatment to patients in the Emergency Department.
Conduct patient assessments and provide critical care as required.
Maintain accurate nursing documentation and records.
Manage medical equipment and ensure proper functioning.
Collaborate with healthcare team members to ensure effective patient care.
Respond to emergency situations and provide immediate care and support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing or related field (RN license required)
